question: Marieke Lucas Rijneveld has been awarded International Booker Prize 2020, for which novel?
explanation:
The prestigious International Booker Prize for the year 2020 has been awarded to the Dutch author Marieke Lucas Rijneveld for her debut novel “Discomfort of Evening”.
The novel has been translated to English by Michele Hutchison. This prize is announced annually for the best book translated into English and published in UK or Ireland.
